content.raw:
What I had in mind is to centralize this code in a single function so to add support for OpenStack more easily (e.g. setting up an OpenStack region, configuring the endpoint, etc.). Also, AFAIK ```BotoConfig``` doesn't store such information, so we'd have to pull it from CloudSim's configuration.

Is there a way we could merge both approaches? That is, avoid code duplication, but still being able to launch constellations simultaneously in different regions.
